name: Aleksandr Liukov
profile: Security engineer with 11 years of experience specializing in application security and secure SDLC integration. Architects enterprise security pipelines and vulnerability management systems, embedding security tooling into CI/CD workflows. Develops AI-driven tools for automated code analysis and vulnerability triage. OSCP certified with hands-on penetration testing experience; CISSP certified for broad security knowledge.
workRights: Based in Cyprus. Open to relocation to US. Require visa sponsorship.
